title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another day of offensive struggles for the Patriots, Colin examines Bill Belichick's career and how he has always struggled to develop relationships with quarterbacks. He defends Patrick Mahomes from some of the recent criticisms and argues he's clearly better than Aaron Rodgers right now. He also shares the truth about the Cowboys who have been fooling people for years with their inflated regular season record. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to join Colin in his defense of Mahomes and why Kevin Durant can ultimately win by staying in Brooklyn with the Nets. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
